tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT, 
    order_date DATE, 
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    items_ordered JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    email STRING,
    age INT,
    address STRING
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    products JSONB
);
